work.occupation: Former United States Marine turned professional vigilante
work.base: Mobile, usually in New York City

connections.groupAffiliation: None; Formerly Secret Avengers, Daredevil's Unnamed Super-Hero Team, Green Berets, U.S. Marine Corps
connections.relatives: Maria Castle (Wife, deceased), Christie Castle (Daughter, deceased), Frank Castle Junior (Son, deceased), Mario Castle (Father, deceased), Louisa Castle (Mother, deceased), Rocco Castiglione (Uncle, deceased), Esmerelda Castiglione (Aunt, deceased), Michael Castle (Brother, stillborn, deceased).
